title: Filippo Grandi
subtitle: A frank, constructive talk with Prime Minister @kmitsotakis on how to address in principled and practical ways refugee+migrant challenges in the Greek islands: overcrowding, inadequate services, violence; and on how to support the longer term integration of recognized refugees. pic.twitter.com/OVuJTHdrAk â€“ at Athens, Greece

title: Filippo Grandi
subtitle: Improve living conditions; decongest reception areas by moving refugees to mainland; protect unaccompanied children; ensure efficient, fair asylum process.
